component.text: Click the Active and Passive buttons for more information.

Server initiates the data transfer connection. A user requests data transfer, the server-PI instructs the server-DTP to connect to the user-DTP. The user-DTP listens for the connection from the server DTP.

Client initiates the data transfer connection. A user-PI connects to the server-PI and instructs the server-DTP to be passive. The Server-PI replies with its IP address and a dynamic port number that the client is to use the data transfer. The server-DTP then listens for a connection from the client-DTP.
